Plot: A pair of crew members aboard a spaceship wake up with no knowledge of their mission or their identities.
Title: Pandorum
Writer: Travis Milloy (screenplay), Travis Milloy (story), Christian Alvart (story)
Actors: Dennis Quaid, Ben Foster, Cam Gigandet, Antje Traue
tomatoConsensus: While it might prove somewhat satisfying for devout sci-fi fans, Pandorum's bloated, derivative plot ultimately leaves it drifting in space.
